;This newspaper, Beijing, October 30th  (Reporters Liu Zhiqiang and Wang Yunshan) The National Bureau of Statistics recently released data showing that In the third quarter, the profits of industrial enterprises nationwide increased by 7.7% year-on-year, showing an accelerating recovery trend. Since the beginning of this year, profits of industrial enterprises above designated size have rebounded quarter by quarter. In September, the profits of industrial enterprises nationwide increased by 11.9% year-on-year, achieving double-digit growth for two consecutive months.

;

;As market demand continues to recover, the prices of industrial products have gradually recovered, and the revenue of industrial enterprises has improved significantly. In the first three quarters, the operating income of industrial enterprises above designated size was flat year-on-year, and the growth rate increased by 0.4 and 0.5 percentage points respectively from the first half of the year and the first quarter. Among them, the operating income of industrial enterprises above designated size increased by 0.3% year-on-year in the third quarter. Looking at the monthly basis, the operating income of industrial enterprises above designated size increased by 1.2% year-on-year in September, increasing for two consecutive months, and the growth rate accelerated by 0.4 percentage points compared with August.

;

;In the third quarter, manufacturing profits increased by 11.8% year-on-year; profits from the electricity, heat, gas and water production and supply industry increased by 44.5% year-on-year, and the growth rate accelerated by 10.6 percentage points from the second quarter.

;

;Benefiting from factors such as the continued recovery of the economy and the continued effects of policies to expand domestic demand, consumer demand continues to pick up, and profits in the consumer goods industry have improved significantly.

;On both sides of the Songhua River, there are thousands of miles of fertile fields and golden land. Heilongjiang welcomes another bumper grain harvest. In recent years, Heilongjiang's annual grain output has stabilized at more than 150 billion jin, and its three major indicators of total output, commodity volume, and transfer volume rank first in the country.

;

;Heavy machine tools roar, precision instruments operate, innovation vitality bursts, and old industrial bases glow with new vitality. The "Guohe No. 1" nuclear reactor pressure vessels participated in the research and development by China First Heavy Industry Group Co., Ltd. were all independently designed and manufactured locally. The world's largest single-unit capacity of one million kilowatt hydroelectric generator set, which Harbin Electric Group Co., Ltd. participated in the development of, is at the Baihetan Hydropower Station. Successful operation...Technological innovation leads Heilongjiang to accelerate its revitalization.

;

;In September this year, General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized during an inspection in Heilongjiang that we must firmly grasp the strategic positioning in the overall development of the country, grasp the primary task of promoting high-quality development, and implement the Party Central Committee’s instructions on promoting Northeast China Decision-making and deployment of comprehensive revitalization, utilizing strengths to offset weaknesses, transforming resource advantages, ecological advantages, scientific research advantages, industrial advantages, and location advantages into new momentum and new advantages for development, and building and strengthening the country's important commodity grain production base, heavy equipment production and manufacturing base, and important Energy and raw material base, northern ecological security barrier, and new highland for opening up to the north, actively perform their duties in safeguarding national defense security, food security, ecological security, energy security, and industrial security, and strive to create Heilongjiang in the comprehensive revitalization and all-round revitalization. A new situation of high-quality development.

;

;Keeping in mind General Secretary Xi Jinping’s earnest instructions, the cadres and masses of Heilongjiang work together to forge ahead and strive to create a new situation of high-quality development.

;

;;Science and technology innovation cluster activates new momentum for development;

;

;With the sound of operation, the first hydraulic press forging plant of China First Heavy Industry Group Co., Ltd. independently developed and manufactured in China The 15,000-ton free forging hydraulic press started working, and the surface temperature of the circular forging reached more than 1,200 degrees Celsius... In the past 70 years, China First Heavy Industry Group Co., Ltd. has developed a total of 421 new products, filling 475 domestic industrial product technology gaps.

;

;Heilongjiang strives to put the basis of revitalization and development on innovation. In the past five years, the province's R&D investment has increased at an average annual rate of 5%, and the turnover of technology contracts has increased at an average annual rate of 28.5%. In the first half of this year, the province realized the transformation of 278 new major scientific and technological achievements, generating economic benefits of approximately 3.04 billion yuan.

;

;In June this year, my country's first flat-panel new system low-orbit broadband communication test satellite "Longjiang-3" was successfully launched. "Longjiang-3" was jointly developed by Harbin Institute of Technology and Harbin Institute of Technology Satellite Technology Co., Ltd., and broke through key technologies such as regenerative low-orbit satellite-to-ground high-speed communications and flat-panel satellite platforms.

;

;Harbin Institute of Technology Satellite Technology Co., Ltd. is a satellite manufacturing enterprise incubated by Harbin Institute of Technology and located in Harbin New District. More than 40 companies related to the space and satellite field have gathered here, driving the rapid development of the satellite industry chain. "Using the role of technological innovation as an incrementer, we are fully committed to building a satellite industry cluster in Heilongjiang Province." said Shao Gang, a member of the Party Working Committee of Harbin New District.

;

;The number of state-certified high-tech enterprises in Heilongjiang has increased from 929 in 2017 to the current 3,605. Last year, the revenue of five strategic emerging industries including aerospace, electronic information manufacturing, and new materials all achieved double-digit growth. In the first half of this year, the added value of the aerospace vehicle and equipment manufacturing industry increased by 24.2%.

;

;Innovation empowers, and the advantages of traditional industries continue to be consolidated.

;

;In the "Heilongjiang Province Digital (Intelligent) Demonstration Workshop" of Harbin Xinha Precision Bearing Co., Ltd., intelligent high-speed bearing production lines, automatic adjustment electrical systems, CNC machine tools and other intelligent equipment are all available. “New product R&D and design all use digital tools, and the digitalization rate reaches 100%.” said Zhang Li, the person in charge of the company.

;

;Currently, Heilongjiang Province has certified 279 provincial-level digital (intelligent) demonstration workshops and smart factories. In Xiangfang District, Harbin City, an old industrial area, the added value of industrial enterprises above designated size increased by 9.2% year-on-year in the first half of this year.

;

;;Modern agriculture cultivates new competitive advantages;

;

;In the golden autumn, 531,000 acres of rice in Fujin City have gradually entered the mature harvest period.

;

;Fujin Chang'an Town is a typical low-lying town that is prone to waterlogging all year round. “This year’s harvest will be great, and the rice yield per mu can reach 1,000 kilograms.” Liu Chun, a villager in Dongbei Village, Chang’an Town, said that this is due to the construction of high-standard farmland and the repair of “sewers”, which can be irrigated during droughts and drained during floods.

;

;Hide food in the ground, and hide food in technology. Heilongjiang Province has built more than 100 million acres of high-standard farmland, and the province's comprehensive mechanization rate for crop cultivation and harvesting has stabilized at over 98%.

;

;With full pods, soybeans in Hailun City, Suihua City are ushering in a bumper harvest.

;

;“Only by strengthening the ‘seed chip’ can we secure the ‘Chinese rice bowl’.” In the test field of the Hailun Agricultural Ecological Experiment Station of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, scientific researcher Li Yanhua has been engaged in soybean breeding research in cold black soil areas for more than 30 years. 17 new varieties of the "Dongsheng" series have been introduced, which have been promoted to a total of 50 million acres, increasing production by 2 billion jin, and increasing benefits by 4 billion yuan.

;

;In recent years, Heilongjiang has vigorously implemented seed industry revitalization actions, built a national-level cold-land crop germplasm resource bank, launched the construction of a national-level soybean seed base, and has reached 19 national seed-producing counties and regional improved seed breeding bases. , and built 16 expert breeding bases.

;

;

;Small corn has become a big industry, reflecting the large agricultural base of Heilongjiang , large enterprises and large industries are accelerating their development. The provincial-level high-quality agricultural brand "Black Soil Premium" has gone nationwide.

;

;

;;Green development highlights a beautiful new look;

;

; Standing at the observation deck of Feicui Lake Mine Forest Park, Baoqing County, Shuangyashan City, you can see that the oval lake is like a star. Blue gems are embedded in the forest.

;

;“This used to be an abandoned open-pit mine.” Zhao Zhenping, deputy director of the Natural Resources Bureau of Baoqing County, said that the county has promoted the implementation of mine restoration projects and restored green water through dangerous rock cleaning, soil reconstruction, and vegetation restoration. The original appearance of Qingshan.

;

In 2022, 12,000 sewage outlets into rivers and lakes will be renovated, and the proportion of days with excellent air quality in the province will reach 95.9%.

; ;

;The first “Belt and Road” Science and Technology Exchange Conference will be held in Chongqing from November 6th to 7th. On October 30, the State Council Information Office held a press conference to introduce the relevant situation.

;

;The first "Belt and Road" science and technology exchange conference has the theme of "jointly building a road to innovation and jointly promoting cooperative development", focusing on intergovernmental scientific and technological cooperation, scientific and cultural exchanges, industrial innovation and development, scientific research paradigm changes, and the future On topics such as medicine, open science and big data, there are five major sections and 10 main activities: the opening ceremony and plenary session, the “Belt and Road” Science and Technology Innovation Ministers’ Meeting, theme activities, roundtables and results presentations. The conference adheres to the Silk Road spirit of peace and cooperation, openness and inclusiveness, mutual learning, and mutual benefit. It will release important results reports, launch important measures to promote the "Belt and Road" scientific and technological innovation cooperation, and send out a common aspiration of open cooperation and joint development. .

;

;Vice Minister of Science and Technology Zhang Guangjun said that scientific and technological innovation, as a key force in promoting economic development, improving people's livelihood and responding to global challenges, is a key area in the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" and a key direction of common concern for all countries. . It is hoped that by holding the first “Belt and Road” science and technology exchange conference, focusing on the action of “promoting scientific and technological innovation”, we can jointly review the progress and results of scientific and technological innovation cooperation with co-building countries, jointly explore the trends and directions of scientific and technological innovation development, and jointly discuss the promotion of the Silk Road of Innovation. Key measures for high-quality development.

;

;Chongqing Vice Mayor Zhang Anjiang introduced that more than 300 foreign guests from more than 70 countries and international organizations have been invited to attend, including Nobel Prize winners, foreign academicians, experts and scholars, and presidents of well-known foreign universities. Nearly 40 people. At the same time, domestic academicians, university presidents, representatives of scientific research institutions, and key enterprises will also attend the conference to actively carry out in-depth all-round and multi-field exchanges.

;

;In the 10 years since the “Belt and Road” initiative was proposed, what progress and results have been achieved in scientific and technological innovation cooperation? Zhang Guangjun introduced that with the joint participation and promotion of all parties, the scientific and technological cooperation mechanism has been continuously deepened over the past 10 years, the exchanges of scientific researchers have become closer, and the achievements of scientific and technological cooperation have become increasingly fruitful. Up to now, China has signed intergovernmental scientific and technological cooperation agreements with more than 80 co-building countries, jointly building an all-round, multi-level, and wide-ranging scientific and technological cooperation pattern, and yielding solid and heavy "fruits" of cooperation.

;

;In terms of jointly promoting people-to-people and cultural exchanges, China and co-building countries have deepened all-round scientific and technological exchanges. China has supported more than 10,000 young scientists from co-building countries to come to China for short-term work and exchanges; cumulative training has been provided to co-building countries in science and technology and 16,000 management personnel.

;

;In terms of jointly improving scientific research capabilities, China and co-building countries have implemented many batches of joint research plans and jointly built more than 50 research institutions in agriculture, medical care, information, new energy, basic research and other fields. The “Belt and Road” joint laboratory has established 10 overseas science and education cooperation centers.

;

;In terms of jointly serving the improvement of people's livelihood, China and co-building countries support the construction of a number of public health science and technology cooperation centers, agricultural technology demonstration centers, Juncao technology demonstration centers, mariculture research centers, and mountain disaster research centers. The cooperation platform has also implemented a number of "small but beautiful" cooperation projects to promote scientific and technological achievements and benefit more people.

;

;在共同支撑产业发展方面，中国与共建国家推进科技园区合作和多领域技术转移示范，中国面向东盟、阿拉伯国家、非洲等区域建设了9个跨国技术转移平台，与各国共建覆盖广泛的技术转移网络，服务各国产业升级。

;

;在共同助力文明传承方面，中国与共建国家开展联合考古和文物保护等科研合作，在探寻丝绸之路多元灿烂历史面貌的同时，展现出文明互鉴的和美诗篇。

;

;张广军表示，未来，中方期待与共建国家继续深入实施“一带一路”科技创新行动计划，以开放创新汇合作之力，以共商共建谋发展之路，共同促进更加开放包容、互惠共享的国际科技合作和交流。

;; Tue, 31 Oct 2023 05:56:09 +0800 02版要闻 - 办好更加公平、更高质量的基础教育（政策解读）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/31/nw.D110000renmrb_20231031_6-02.htm
;2023年10月31日星期二
; ;

;建设教育强国，基点在基础教育。为切实办好更加公平、更高质量的基础教育，教育部、国家发展改革委、财政部联合印发《关于实施新时代基础教育扩优提质行动计划的意见》（以下简称《意见》）。

;

;“《意见》致力于深化基础教育供给侧改革，进一步做大优质教育资源'蛋糕'，加快构建幼有优育、学有优教的高质量基础教育体系，解决优质教育资源总体不足与人民群众期望'上好学'的矛盾，增强人民群众教育获得感、幸福感、安全感。”教育部基础教育司司长田祖荫表示。

;

;;深化基础教育供给侧改革;

;

;党的十八大以来，我国基础教育政策制度体系进一步健全，基础教育取得历史性成就，为实现“幼有所育、学有所教”“建成世界上规模最大的教育体系”“教育普及水平实现历史性跨越”发挥了重要作用。

;

;2022年，全国学前三年毛入园率89.7%，比2012年提高25.2个百分点，普惠性幼儿园覆盖率89.6%。九年义务教育巩固率达到95.5%，比2012年提高了3.7个百分点，适龄残疾儿童入学率超过95%。高中阶段教育毛入学率91.6%，比2012年提高6.6个百分点。

;

;目前，我国基础教育普及水平总体达到世界中上行列，在此基础上，《意见》提出新的目标：到2027年，适应新型城镇化发展和学龄人口变化趋势的城乡中小学幼儿园学位供给调整机制基本建立，优质教育资源扩充机制更加健全，学前教育优质普惠、义务教育优质均衡、普通高中优质特色、特殊教育优质融合发展的格局基本形成。

;

;具体而言，学前教育阶段，公办园在园幼儿占比力争达到60%以上；义务教育阶段，扩增一批新优质学校，优质学位供给大幅增加；高中教育阶段，培育一批优质特色高中，普通高中多样化发展扎实推进，高中阶段毛入学率持续提升；特殊教育方面，特教学校在20万人口以上的县基本实现全覆盖，适龄残疾儿童义务教育入学率保持在97%以上。

;

;;扩大优质教育资源供给;

;

;2022年，广东省深圳市龙岗、坪山、光明区，9所高中学校拔地而起。面对公办普通高中学位短缺的难题，深圳实施大规模高中学校建设计划。一批现代化、高颜值的校园，成为深圳市一道亮丽的风景线。

;

;“2020年至2023年，全市共新改扩建41所公办普高、新增9万个公办普高学位，2023年全市普高录取率超过70%。未来两年，还将新增2万个以上公办普高学位，公办普高录取率将持续保持稳定。”深圳市教育局局长郑秀玉说。

;

;深圳市不断加大投入力度、增加学位供给，是扩大优质教育资源供给、构建优质均衡基本公共教育服务体系的举措之一。为解决普通高中多样发展不充分、部分县中水平不高以及群众职普分流焦虑问题，通过加大投入力度“新建一批”、创新办学机制“帮扶一批”、多样化发展“提升一批”、有序增加招生计划“扩容一批”，促进普通高中内涵建设。

;

;此外，在学前教育方面，《意见》主要解决学前教育保障机制不健全、优质普惠性资源不足问题，明确公办园公用经费标准，提出“各地公办园生均公用经费标准原则上应于2024年达到600元/年·人”。在义务教育方面，主要解决义务教育阶段优质教育资源总量不足、城乡校际差距大问题，制定区域优质学校成长发展规划，倾斜支持帮扶有一定基础的学校，办好“家门口”的每所学校。在特殊教育方面，鼓励20万人口以上的县办好一所达到标准的特殊教育学校，20万人口以下的县因地制宜设立特教班。

;

;;提升基础教育育人水平;

;

;漆画挂上教学楼走廊，纸艺、绳艺成为拿手绝活，架子鼓队在舞台上绽放光彩……得益于上海实施的“新优质学校”项目，地处杨浦、宝山、虹口三区交界的三门中学，发展势头一年比一年好。

;

;“坚持回归教育本原，为了每一个学生的健康快乐成长，通过深度调研、案例解析、互动培训、交流分享、立体宣传，我们打造了100多所因材施教、百姓满意的家门口好学校。”上海市教委副主任杨振峰说。

;

;近年来，我国基础教育质量稳步提升，德智体美劳五育并举大力推进，素质教育深入实施，课堂教学改革不断深化。部分省份连续几次参加国际学生评估项目（PISA）测试，阅读、数学、科学等科目成绩名列前茅。

;

;提升教育质量，师资是重要因素。《意见》提出，实施高素质教师队伍建设行动，提高师资保障水平。田祖荫表示，“要完善义务教育学校教师'县管校聘'管理机制，立足学区内、集团内和城乡间为主实施骨干教师交流轮岗计划，加快实现县域内师资均衡配置；支持开展团队式交流，加快提升薄弱学校、农村学校办学水平；加强县域统筹，促进思想政治、科学、体育、艺术、心理健康等紧缺学科教师校际共享。”

;

;提升教育质量，应以数字化赋能。《意见》要求，提升国家中小学智慧教育平台建设应用水平，完善国家基础教育管理服务平台。据了解，目前国家中小学智慧教育平台汇集了德育、课程教学、体育、美育、劳动教育、课后服务、家庭教育、教改等十多个板块，共53个栏目，资源总量达5.04万条。平台大幅提高了师生的信息素养，为优化教育资源配置发挥了重要作用。

;

;据悉，教育部将指导地方明确责任分工，建立健全推进机制，确保各项要求落到实处。同时加强学龄人口变化预测前瞻性研究以及城乡学校布局合理性研究，不断提高工作科学化水平。
